snippet.title: VR Invaders - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Global publisher My.com debuts their first virtual reality PC game, VR Invaders, via Steam VR! VR Invaders is accessible for HTC Vive or Oculus Rift + Touch users through Steam VR today.

Get the game on Steam now: http://1l-go.my.com/r/adid/2215561_2008750/pid/101689/pof/1/f/3/

About VR Invaders:
Follow the story of Thomas Hall in this visceral shooter experience. In 2046, to the delight of corporations, some people spend almost all of their life logged into the virtual reality programs. However, not everyone stays logged in voluntarily. Sometimes a VR user can’t disconnect because of a virus. To protect their profits and extract the Stuck, corporations hire freelance hackers called Divers to enter the client’s neural session and reboot it. Thomas Hall is one of them, and he is always up for the task.
